channel.title: single page on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in single page on Konigi

item.title: Andy Shaw
item.description: Taking a portfolio site to the bare essentials. Links to the latest work & contact options. http://andyshaw.me

item.title: Orange Label Design Studio
item.description: Very nice single-page portfolio from this web design studio. Reload the page a few times to change the large header graphic. The rip-off tabs for the downloadable questionnaires and company profile are a nice touch, as are the individually laid out work samples. Would be nice to see some jump navigation between categories of the beautiful work here. http://www.orangelabel.com/

item.title: HANDCRAFTED CSS
item.description: This is the simple single-page site book site for by Dan Cederholm with Ethan Marcotte's "HANDCRAFTED CSS." http://handcraftedcss.com/

item.title: Fever
item.description: Fever is a feed reading server product. The product site features a single-page design, with well-organized and clear product information at the top, and navigation anchors that scroll the page down. All of the features you need from the service—purchasing info, account info, customer support—are included dynamically in the single page, so once you've purchased the product, for instance, your customer info is populated into the account area.

item.title: inezborges
item.description: inezborges, is a graphic and designer web working on Oporto. Specializing in Web and Print Design, she creates clean, engaging, and functional websites. Nowadays, she spends most of her free time in researching web design technologies. SheÂ´s working in the internet industry, focusing on web design as well as user interface design, web 2.0. http://www.inezborges.com

item.title: Jason Reed Web Design
item.description: I like this simple, one-page portfolio. Uses accordions to switch between sections and tabs within accordion panels to navigate sub-sections. The hand-drawn arrows are a nice touch. http://www.jasonreedwebdesign.com/

item.title: LittleSnapper for iPhone
item.description: Simple single page product site for LittleSnapper iPhone, an app that lets you snap, tag, and share photos. I love the how the screenshots and videos slide into the iphone image on the page when you click the buttons on the right. Brilliant idea. http://www.realmacsoftware.com/littlesnapper/iphone/

item.title: Five Simple Steps
item.description: Lovely single page design for Mark Boulton's upcoming eBook. http://www.fivesimplesteps.co.uk/

item.title: Mediocore - David Arazim Graphic Designer
item.description: Beautiful single page portfolio of illustrator David Arazim's work. http://mediocore.cz/

item.title: Visualbox
item.description: Visualbox is an agency in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Their portfolio is a single page scrolling site with project images laid out on a slate gray tile background. Love the huge heading and the gorgeous, crisp images. http://www.visualboxsite.com/

item.title: RGB
item.description: Single page portfolio of designer Rob Brearly. Large photos and screenshots in a simple grid make this portfolio a pleasure to scroll through. http://www.rgbstudio.co.uk/
